siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, This week we start off with yet another correction, this time Jon messed up. We have a couple of new reviews first a listener reviewed us on iTunes, then Jon reviews a milkshake. We talk about the jam-packed WWDC keynote and highlights from the announcementsâ€¦
